titles.title: To reauthorize the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994.
To reauthorize the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 119-396.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 345.

action.text: Mr. Stauber moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1098.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
